reviews.review: Очень интересная игра затягивает, но оставляет загадочность. Всем советую пройти!!!

I can see what all the hype was about. Of course, the game has aged, but it truly is a memorable experience, with great gameplay. I will say, the ending is a little questionable, but in a good way. When it comes to the story, you will likely be a tad confused. To me, the story is a bit simple, but the way it is expressed makes it quite interesting. You may find yourself wondering how the world ended up this way and how on earth you'll make it through. But of course, gameplay happens and through your journey, you'll get a variety of weapons to choose from, but you may find yourself attached to the gravity gun. The gravity gun may not always be practical, but it certainly is fun. Lastly, the character range from, "who are you?" to "hey, I know you". But, in all seriousness, you'll like the main crew of people and MY GOD, the facial expressions are better than most modern games. To wrap this up, play it for the experience.

[h1] El juego es una obra de arte. [/h1]
[list]
[*]Calidad: 11/10
[*]Historia: 11/10
[*]bugs: 1/10 (encontré pequeños bugs en algunos sitios no tan frecuentes, pero no me molesto a la hora de seguir jugando
[*]Jugabilidad: 10/10
[/list]
El único problema que tiene el juego a mi pareces, son las [u]pantallas de carga[/u].
Existen partes muy emocionantes donde en pocos segundos hay:
 [*] Acción
 [*] Romance
 [*] Drama
Y como cualquier jugador me intriga, pues la historia realmente es interesante, te hace querer verla sin necesidad de cinemáticas obligatorias.

Pero cuando pasas "De un área a otra" el juego se congela y te carga el nuevo mapa.
Creo que es lo único malo que le encontré.

Es el mejor juego de toda una vida

This is very much an improvement over the original Half-Life, to which I thought was good. Not incredible or anything, just good. This game however, improves on mostly every aspect the original game did. I think I'd still prefer the lonely, claustrophobic feel of the original, but that's just me.

Firstly, gameplay has seen a vast upgrade in every department. There is so much nuance to the combat that it would be difficult to explain well in my limited review, but just know that every fight feels unique and satisfying with much more awesome weapons at your disposal. The movement feels so much better than Half-Life one. The game also throws in some different vehicles to spice up the gameplay. And while I think these sections go on for far longer than they have any right to, they can still remain somewhat fun. Puzzles are also very satisfying and exploring the world is also a treat.

Speaking of the world, the world and story might be my favorite thing about Half-Life 2. Without going into spoilers, Half-Life 2's story is very satisfying to see play out, even if it doesn't try anything new on the surface at least.  Half-Life 2 shows its characters, story, and world all through visual storytelling. Sure, there are those sections where stuff is explained to you but those pale in comparison to how the game truly lets its tale play out, Half-Life 2 is a huge fan of [i]show[/i] don't [i]tell[/i] (most of the time), and I love it. The combine are never stated to you to be actually awful aliens, but you can tell how fucking repulsive they are just by looking around. I heard the devs wanted you to experience the story without ever taking control away from you, and that approach worked 100%.  The gameplay is constantly in your control allowing you to experience rich gameplay with incredible visual storytelling. It amazes me that the game is able to do this without ever having a single cutscene.

Half-Life 2 is a landmark title in gaming. It's not without its faults (mainly the sometimes wonky pacing), but these faults are [b]easily[/b] overshadowed by a game that feels so perfectly crafted. You owe it to yourself to play this.
Absoluter Klassiker, der auch von Nutzern mit veralteter Hardware genossen werden kann.

Hermoso juego, un shooter genial, disfrutable, con una historia interesante, unas gráficas avanzadas para su época, el gameplay está muy bien trabajado es fácil de aprender, rápido. Algo que creo que se podría mejorar es cuando subes a algún lugar y Gordon se queda ahí mirando la pared, o quieres saltar a algún sitio y terminas cayéndote, molesta un poco que estás trasladándote de un lugar a otro y de la nada te salga una pantalla de carga, pero creo que eso es debido a las limitaciones de la época y por ahorrar espacio. En general el juego es excelente un clásico que ha envejecido muy bien.
 Ojo que no es una reseña profesional solo es mi opinión.

Эта игра как $ек$, хороша когда тебе 18, хороша когда тебе 30.  Самые натуральные развалины постсовка которые только можно было придумать, самые матерливые зомбе и просто какой то гений придумал этих страйдеров, до сих пор помню когда впервые увидел страйдера во второй части, это было нечто. В Half Life 2 всё всегда остаётся  прежним - безлюдным, душным, грустным, родным. И к сожалению это история, продолжение которой мы ждём уже слишком долго.
